Banner: Edite is on Product Hunt! Show your support.

SectionOne.Title: Your new Photoshop
SectionOne.Description: A simple way to edit your photos and getting satisfied

SectionTwo.Title: Simple tools do the difference
SectionTwo.Description: Use simple tools that will give an awesome effect to your photos

One.Name: Crop
One.Description: Crop your favourite part of the photo or resize it.

Two.Name: Text
Two.Description: Add text and edit its size, colors, shape, and choose a great font.

Three.Name: Filter
Three.Description: Apply filters to your photos and change their mood.

Four.Name: Shortcuts
Four.Description: Use your keyboard to make your editing process faster.

Five.Name: Settings
Five.Description: Change the language and theme to make you comfortable.

Question.One: Do I need to pay anything?
Question.Two: Why am I facing some problems on Edite Web app?
Question.Three: How can I report an issue or help with the Web app?

Answer.One: No. Edite still on its alpha-beta transition, but it will have two types of plans: free-forever and premium. In the meantime, all the features will be available to you as a gift
Answer.Two: As Edite still on its alpha-beta transition, some of the features can be not working or still being built. But don't worry! It'll be solved ASAP
Answer.Three: Edite has a GitHub repository with everything about the Web app and you can also see how to contribute

SectionFour.Title: Invite your friends
SectionFour.Description: Share your best shots with an awesome Discord community
